availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hugh Mize (Claiborne county, Tennessee, laborer and farmer)

body.p: Claiborne county, Tennessee, laborer and farmer. Tennessee native. Son of Reps Mize and Dicy Mize. Married to Mary Mize. Father of Daniel L. Mize, Rachael Mize, Eli Mize, Melvina Mize, and Nervester Mize. Laborer in Claiborne County in 1850. Farmer in Claiborne County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Claiborne County, Subdivision 7, p. 252A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Claiborne County, Subdivision 6, p. 294.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Precinct 1, p. 155A.
